description:
Violet enrolls in a Doll training course. Her classmate Luculia befriends her, though she has her own problems with her war veteran brother.
Source: netflix

titles.title: "Anata ga, Yoki Jidou Shuki Ningyou ni Narimasu You ni"
May You Be an Exemplary Auto Memoir Doll
Obyś była wspaniałą lalką zapisującą myśli
「あなたが, 良き自動手記人形になりますように」
「당신이, 좋은 자동 수기 인형이 될 수 있기를」
